General.Name: Metallica Metals Corp
General.Description: Metallica Metals Corp. engages in the exploration of mineral properties. The company primarily explores for gold, silver, nickel, copper, and platinum group metal deposits. Its flagship property is the Starr project located in the Shebandowan Greenstone Belt, Ontario. The company was formerly known as Cameo Industries Corp. and changed its name to Metallica Metals Corp. in December 2020. Metallica Metals Corp. was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
